citation.fr: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"ca.cioos_e0551741-9bcc-4c48-976b-1c2854a32d34\", \"author\": [{\"literal\": \"The University of Victoria, Institute for Integrated Energy Systems (PRIMED)\"}, {\"given\": \"Brad\", \"family\": \"Buckham\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2022\", \"07\", \"12\"]}], \"abstract\": \"Mesures des vagues, du vent, du courant et de la temp\u00e9rature de surface de la mer recueillies in situ par des bou\u00e9es \u00e0 vagues instrument\u00e9es situ\u00e9es au large de la c\u00f4te ouest de l'\u00eele de Vancouver. Ce jeu de donn\u00e9es comprend les types de variables suivants\u00a0: param\u00e8tres des vagues (tels que la hauteur significative des vagues), spectres des vagues et coefficients de Fourier, s\u00e9ries chronologiques d'\u00e9l\u00e9vation de l'eau, vitesse et direction du vent, temp\u00e9rature de l'eau de mer, courants de surface et sous-surface. Le Pacific Regional Institute for Marine Energy Discovery (PRIMED) est un laboratoire de recherche industrielle op\u00e9rant \u00e0 partir de l'Institute for Integrated Energy Systems de l'Universit\u00e9 de Victoria. En collaborant avec l'industrie et les communaut\u00e9s c\u00f4ti\u00e8res, PRIMED soutient le d\u00e9veloppement responsable des \u00e9nergies marines renouvelables en Colombie-Britannique.\", \"edition\": \"\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"Institut des syst\u00e8mes \u00e9nerg\u00e9tiques int\u00e9gr\u00e9s (PRIMED) de l'Universit\u00e9 de Victoria, AXYS Watchman 500\", \"language\": \"fr\", \"URL\": \"https://catalogue.cioospacific.ca/dataset/ca-cioos_e0551741-9bcc-4c48-976b-1c2854a32d34?local=fr\"}]
citation.en: [{\"type\": \"dataset\", \"id\": \"ca.cioos_e0551741-9bcc-4c48-976b-1c2854a32d34\", \"author\": [{\"literal\": \"The University of Victoria, Institute for Integrated Energy Systems (PRIMED)\"}, {\"given\": \"Brad\", \"family\": \"Buckham\"}], \"issued\": [{\"date-parts\": [\"2022\", \"07\", \"12\"]}], \"abstract\": \"Wave, wind, current and sea surface temperature measurements collected in situ by instrumented wave buoys located off the west coast of Vancouver Island. This dataset includes the following type of variables: wave parameters (such as significant wave height), wave spectra and Fourier coefficients, water elevation time-series, wind speed and direction, sea water temperature, surface and sub surface currents. The Pacific Regional Institute for Marine Energy Discovery (PRIMED) is a industrial research laboratory operating out of the Institute for Integrated Energy Systems at the University of Victoria. Through collaboration with industry and coastal communities, PRIMED supports responsible marine renewable energy development in British Columbia.\", \"edition\": \"\", \"edition-date\": \"\", \"publisher\": \"\", \"title\": \"The University of Victoria, Institute for Integrated Energy Systems (PRIMED) AXYS Watchman 500\", \"language\": \"en\", \"URL\": \"https://catalogue.cioospacific.ca/dataset/ca-cioos_e0551741-9bcc-4c48-976b-1c2854a32d34?local=en\"}]

      <mri:abstract xsi:type="lan:PT_FreeText_PropertyType">
        <gco:CharacterString>Wave, wind, current and sea surface temperature measurements collected in situ by instrumented wave buoys located off the west coast of Vancouver Island. This dataset includes the following type of variables: wave parameters (such as significant wave height), wave spectra and Fourier coefficients, water elevation time-series, wind speed and direction, sea water temperature, surface and sub surface currents. The Pacific Regional Institute for Marine Energy Discovery (PRIMED) is a industrial research laboratory operating out of the Institute for Integrated Energy Systems at the University of Victoria. Through collaboration with industry and coastal communities, PRIMED supports responsible marine renewable energy development in British Columbia.</gco:CharacterString>
        <lan:PT_FreeText>
          <lan:textGroup>
            <lan:LocalisedCharacterString locale="#fr">Mesures des vagues, du vent, du courant et de la température de surface de la mer recueillies in situ par des bouées à vagues instrumentées situées au large de la côte ouest de l'île de Vancouver. Ce jeu de données comprend les types de variables suivants : paramètres des vagues (tels que la hauteur significative des vagues), spectres des vagues et coefficients de Fourier, séries chronologiques d'élévation de l'eau, vitesse et direction du vent, température de l'eau de mer, courants de surface et sous-surface. Le Pacific Regional Institute for Marine Energy Discovery (PRIMED) est un laboratoire de recherche industrielle opérant à partir de l'Institute for Integrated Energy Systems de l'Université de Victoria. En collaborant avec l'industrie et les communautés côtières, PRIMED soutient le développement responsable des énergies marines renouvelables en Colombie-Britannique.</lan:LocalisedCharacterString>
          </lan:textGroup>
        </lan:PT_FreeText>
      </mri:abstract>
      <mri:credit>
        <gco:CharacterString></gco:CharacterString>
      </mri:credit>
      <mri:status>
        <mcc:MD_ProgressCode codeList="http://standards.iso.org/iso/19115/resources/Codelists/cat/codelists.xml#MD_ProgressCode" codeListValue="onGoing"></mcc:MD_ProgressCode>
      </mri:status>
      <mri:topicCategory>
        <mri:MD_TopicCategoryCode>oceans</mri:MD_TopicCategoryCode>
      </mri:topicCategory>

              <gex:verticalCRSId>
                <mrs:MD_ReferenceSystem>

                      </mcc:codeSpace>
                      <mcc:version>

                      </mcc:version>
                      <mcc:description>
                        <gco:CharacterString>EPSG::5831 - Instantaneous Water Level depth - Depth relative to instantaneous water level uncorrected for tide. Not specific to any location or epoch.</gco:CharacterString>
                      </mcc:description>
                    </mcc:MD_Identifier>

name: ca-cioos_e0551741-9bcc-4c48-976b-1c2854a32d34
notes: Wave, wind, current and sea surface temperature measurements collected in situ by instrumented wave buoys located off the west coast of Vancouver Island. This dataset includes the following type of variables: wave parameters (such as significant wave height), wave spectra and Fourier coefficients, water elevation time-series, wind speed and direction, sea water temperature, surface and sub surface currents. The Pacific Regional Institute for Marine Energy Discovery (PRIMED) is a industrial research laboratory operating out of the Institute for Integrated Energy Systems at the University of Victoria. Through collaboration with industry and coastal communities, PRIMED supports responsible marine renewable energy development in British Columbia.

notes_translated.en: Wave, wind, current and sea surface temperature measurements collected in situ by instrumented wave buoys located off the west coast of Vancouver Island. This dataset includes the following type of variables: wave parameters (such as significant wave height), wave spectra and Fourier coefficients, water elevation time-series, wind speed and direction, sea water temperature, surface and sub surface currents. The Pacific Regional Institute for Marine Energy Discovery (PRIMED) is a industrial research laboratory operating out of the Institute for Integrated Energy Systems at the University of Victoria. Through collaboration with industry and coastal communities, PRIMED supports responsible marine renewable energy development in British Columbia.
notes_translated.fr: Mesures des vagues, du vent, du courant et de la température de surface de la mer recueillies in situ par des bouées à vagues instrumentées situées au large de la côte ouest de l'île de Vancouver. Ce jeu de données comprend les types de variables suivants : paramètres des vagues (tels que la hauteur significative des vagues), spectres des vagues et coefficients de Fourier, séries chronologiques d'élévation de l'eau, vitesse et direction du vent, température de l'eau de mer, courants de surface et sous-surface. Le Pacific Regional Institute for Marine Energy Discovery (PRIMED) est un laboratoire de recherche industrielle opérant à partir de l'Institute for Integrated Energy Systems de l'Université de Victoria. En collaborant avec l'industrie et les communautés côtières, PRIMED soutient le développement responsable des énergies marines renouvelables en Colombie-Britannique.

description_translated.en: The Canadian Integrated Ocean Observing System (CIOOS) Pacific is the regional hub of the National CIOOS for ocean data aggregation on Canada’s west coast.
description_translated.fr: Le Système intégré d’observation des océans canadien (SIOOC) Pacifique est la plaque tournante régionale du SIOOC national pour l’agrégation des données océaniques sur la côte ouest du Canada.
